verses.verse: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician לְדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> of David מִזְמ֑וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> O God תְ֝הִלָּתִ֗י <S%H8416><s%> of my praise אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֶּחֱרַֽשׁ׃ <S%H2790><s%> Hold not thy peace

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for פִ֪י <S%H6310><s%> For the mouth רָשָׁ֡ע <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked וּֽפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> and the mouth מִ֭רְמָה <S%H4820><s%> of the deceitful עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> against פָּתָ֑חוּ <S%H6605><s%> are opened דִּבְּר֥וּ <S%H1696><s%> against me they have spoken אִ֝תִּ֗י <S%H854><s%> against לְשׁ֣וֹן <S%H3956><s%> tongue שָֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> against me with a lying

וְדִבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> me about also with words שִׂנְאָ֣ה <S%H8135><s%> of hatred סְבָב֑וּנִי <S%H5437><s%> They compassed וַיִּֽלָּחֲמ֥וּנִי <S%H3898><s%> and fought חִנָּֽם׃ <S%H2600><s%> against me without a cause
תַּֽחַת־ <S%H8478><s%> return אַהֲבָתִ֥י <S%H160><s%> For my love יִשְׂטְנ֗וּנִי <S%H7853><s%> they are my adversaries וַאֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I תְפִלָּֽה׃ <S%H8605><s%> but I [give myself unto] prayer

וַיָּ֘שִׂ֤ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> And they have rewarded עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> and רָ֭עָה <S%H7451><s%> me evil תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash טוֹבָ֑ה <S%H2896><s%> for good וְ֝שִׂנְאָ֗ה <S%H8135><s%> and hatred תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash אַהֲבָתִֽי׃ <S%H160><s%> for my love

הַפְקֵ֣ד <S%H6485><s%> Set עָלָ֣יו <S%H5921><s%> over רָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> thou a wicked man וְ֝שָׂטָ֗ן <S%H7854><s%> over him and let Satan יַעֲמֹ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> stand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יְמִינֽוֹ׃ <S%H3225><s%> at his right hand

בְּ֭הִשָּׁ֣פְטוֹ <S%H8199><s%> When he shall be judged יֵצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> let him be רָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> condemned וּ֝תְפִלָּת֗וֹ <S%H8605><s%> and let his prayer תִּהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לַֽחֲטָאָֽה׃ <S%H2401><s%> become sin

יִֽהְיֽוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> Let יָמָ֥יו <S%H3117><s%> Let his days מְעַטִּ֑ים <S%H4592><s%> be few פְּ֝קֻדָּת֗וֹ <S%H6486><s%> his office יִקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> take אַחֵֽר׃ <S%H312><s%> [and] let another
יִֽהְיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> Let בָנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> Let his children יְתוֹמִ֑ים <S%H3490><s%> be fatherless וְ֝אִשְׁתּוֹ <S%H802><s%> and his wife אַלְמָנָֽה׃ <S%H490><s%> a widow

וְנ֤וֹעַ <S%H5128><s%> be continually יָנ֣וּעוּ <S%H5128><s%> vagabonds בָנָ֣יו <S%H1121><s%> Let his children וְשִׁאֵ֑לוּ <S%H7592><s%> and beg וְ֝דָרְשׁ֗וּ <S%H1875><s%> let them seek מֵחָרְבוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H2723><s%> [their bread] also out of their desolate places

יְנַקֵּ֣שׁ <S%H5367><s%> catch נ֭וֹשֶׁה <S%H5383><s%> Let the extortioner לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after ל֑וֹ וְיָבֹ֖זּוּ <S%H962><s%> spoil זָרִ֣ים <S%H2114><s%> all that he hath and let the strangers יְגִיעֽוֹ׃ <S%H3018><s%> his labour אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become

ל֭וֹ מֹשֵׁ֣ךְ <S%H4900><s%> Let there be none to extend חָ֑סֶד <S%H2617><s%> mercy וְֽאַל־ <S%H408><s%> Let there be none יְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become ח֝וֹנֵ֗ן <S%H2603><s%> unto him neither let there be any to favour לִיתוֹמָֽיו׃ <S%H3490><s%> his fatherless children

יְהִֽי־ <S%H1961><s%> Let אַחֲרִית֥וֹ <S%H319><s%> Let his posterity לְהַכְרִ֑ית <S%H3772><s%> be cut off בְּד֥וֹר <S%H1755><s%> [and] in the generation אַ֝חֵ֗ר <S%H312><s%> following יִמַּ֥ח <S%H4229><s%> be blotted out שְׁמָֽם׃ <S%H8034><s%> let their name

יִזָּכֵ֤ר ׀ <S%H2142><s%> be remembered עֲוֹ֣ן <S%H5771><s%> Let the iniquity אֲ֭בֹתָיו <S%H1><s%> of his fathers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> with the LORD וְחַטַּ֥את <S%H2403><s%> and let not the sin אִ֝מּ֗וֹ <S%H517><s%> of his mother אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּמָּֽח׃ <S%H4229><s%> be blotted out

יִהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> Let נֶֽגֶד־ <S%H5048><s%> them be before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Let them be before the LORD תָּמִ֑יד <S%H8548><s%> continually וְיַכְרֵ֖ת <S%H3772><s%> that he may cut off מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of them from the earth זִכְרָֽם׃ <S%H2143><s%> the memory

יַ֗עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because אֲשֶׁ֤ר ׀ <S%H834><s%> after לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not זָכַר֮ <S%H2142><s%> Because that he remembered עֲשׂ֪וֹת <S%H6213><s%> not to shew חָ֥סֶד <S%H2617><s%> mercy וַיִּרְדֹּ֡ף <S%H7291><s%> but persecuted אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> man עָנִ֣י <S%H6041><s%> the poor וְ֭אֶבְיוֹן <S%H34><s%> and needy וְנִכְאֵ֨ה <S%H5218><s%> broken לֵבָ֬ב <S%H3824><s%> in heart לְמוֹתֵֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> that he might even slay

וַיֶּאֱהַ֣ב <S%H157><s%> As he loved קְ֭לָלָה <S%H7045><s%> cursing וַתְּבוֹאֵ֑הוּ <S%H935><s%> so let it come וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not חָפֵ֥ץ <S%H2654><s%> unto him as he delighted בִּ֝בְרָכָ֗ה <S%H1293><s%> not in blessing וַתִּרְחַ֥ק <S%H7368><s%> so let it be far מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

וַיִּלְבַּ֥שׁ <S%H3847><s%> As he clothed קְלָלָ֗ה <S%H7045><s%> himself with cursing כְּמַ֫דּ֥וֹ <S%H4055><s%> like as with his garment וַתָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> so let it come כַמַּ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> like water בְּקִרְבּ֑וֹ <S%H7130><s%> into his bowels וְ֝כַשֶּׁ֗מֶן <S%H8081><s%> and like oil בְּעַצְמוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H6106><s%> into his bones

תְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become ל֭וֹ כְּבֶ֣גֶד <S%H899><s%> Let it be unto him as the garment יַעְטֶ֑ה <S%H5844><s%> [which] covereth וּ֝לְמֵ֗זַח <S%H4206><s%> him and for a girdle תָּמִ֥יד <S%H8548><s%> continually יַחְגְּרֶֽהָ׃ <S%H2296><s%> wherewith he is girded

זֹ֤את <S%H2063><s%> likewise פְּעֻלַּ֣ת <S%H6468><s%> [Let] this [be] the reward שֹׂ֭טְנַי <S%H7853><s%> of mine adversaries מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD וְהַדֹּבְרִ֥ים <S%H1696><s%> and of them that speak רָ֝֗ע <S%H7451><s%> evil עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> against my soul

וְאַתָּ֤ה ׀ <S%H859><s%> O יְה֘וִ֤ה <S%H3069><s%> thou for me O GOD אֲדֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> the Lord עֲ‍ֽשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> But do אִ֭תִּי <S%H854><s%> for לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> sake שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <S%H8034><s%> for thy name's כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [is] good חַ֝סְדְּךָ֗ <S%H2617><s%> sake because thy mercy הַצִּילֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5337><s%> deliver

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For עָנִ֣י <S%H6041><s%> For I [am] poor וְאֶבְי֣וֹן <S%H34><s%> and needy אָנֹ֑כִי <S%H595><s%> and my וְ֝לִבִּ֗י <S%H3820><s%> and my heart חָלַ֥ל <S%H2490><s%> is wounded בְּקִרְבִּֽי׃ <S%H7130><s%> within

כְּצֵל־ <S%H6738><s%> like the shadow כִּנְטוֹת֥וֹ <S%H5186><s%> when it declineth נֶהֱלָ֑כְתִּי <S%H1980><s%> I am gone נִ֝נְעַ֗רְתִּי <S%H5287><s%> I am tossed up and down כָּֽאַרְבֶּֽה׃ <S%H697><s%> as the locust

בִּ֭רְכַּי <S%H1290><s%> My knees כָּשְׁל֣וּ <S%H3782><s%> are weak מִצּ֑וֹם <S%H6685><s%> through fasting וּ֝בְשָׂרִ֗י <S%H1320><s%> and my flesh כָּחַ֥שׁ <S%H3584><s%> faileth מִשָּֽׁמֶן׃ <S%H8081><s%> of fatness

וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <S%H589><s%> I הָיִ֣יתִי <S%H1961><s%> have become חֶרְפָּ֣ה <S%H2781><s%> I became also a reproach לָהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> they יִ֝רְא֗וּנִי <S%H7200><s%> unto them [when] they looked יְנִיע֥וּן <S%H5128><s%> upon me they shaked רֹאשָֽׁם׃ <S%H7218><s%> their heads
עָ֭זְרֵנִי <S%H5826><s%> Help יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> me O LORD אֱלֹהָ֑י <S%H430><s%> my God ה֭וֹשִׁיעֵ֣נִי <S%H3467><s%> O save כְחַסְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H2617><s%> me according to thy mercy

וְֽ֭יֵדְעוּ <S%H3045><s%> That they may know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָ֣דְךָ <S%H3027><s%> that this [is] thy hand זֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> You יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> [that] thou LORD עֲשִׂיתָֽהּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> hast done

יְקַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H7043><s%> Let them curse הֵמָּה֮ <S%H1992><s%> like וְאַתָּ֪ה <S%H859><s%> You תְבָ֫רֵ֥ךְ <S%H1288><s%> but bless קָ֤מוּ ׀ <S%H6965><s%> thou when they arise וַיֵּבֹ֗שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> let them be ashamed וְֽעַבְדְּךָ֥ <S%H5650><s%> but let thy servant יִשְׂמָֽח׃ <S%H8055><s%> rejoice

יִלְבְּשׁ֣וּ <S%H3847><s%> be clothed שׂוֹטְנַ֣י <S%H7853><s%> Let mine adversaries כְּלִמָּ֑ה <S%H3639><s%> with shame וְיַעֲט֖וּ <S%H5844><s%> and let them cover כַמְעִ֣יל <S%H4598><s%> as with a mantle בָּשְׁתָּֽם׃ <S%H1322><s%> themselves with their own confusion

א֘וֹדֶ֤ה <S%H3034><s%> praise יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מְאֹ֣ד <S%H3966><s%> I will greatly בְּפִ֑י <S%H6310><s%> with my mouth וּבְת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> him among רַבִּ֣ים <S%H7227><s%> the multitude אֲהַֽלְלֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H1984><s%> yea I will praise

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יַ֭עֲמֹד <S%H5975><s%> For he shall stand לִימִ֣ין <S%H3225><s%> at the right hand אֶבְי֑וֹן <S%H34><s%> of the poor לְ֝הוֹשִׁ֗יעַ <S%H3467><s%> to save מִשֹּׁפְטֵ֥י <S%H8199><s%> [him] from those that condemn נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H5315><s%> his soul
